tour.question: How can I schedule a school tour?
tour.answer: You can schedule a tour by contacting our admissions office through this form or calling us directly.

enrollment.question: When is the enrollment period?
enrollment.answer: General enrollment for the next academic year begins in January and ends in April.

progress.question: How can I check my child's academic progress?
progress.answer: Parents can access academic reports through our parent portal or schedule a meeting with teachers.

hero.title: Academic Excellence
hero.description: At Argane Secondary School in Tiznit, we provide a comprehensive education that prepares students for success in the national Baccalauréat and beyond.

overview.title: Our Academic Approach
overview.paragraph1: Argane Secondary School (الثانوية التأهيلية أركان) follows the Moroccan national curriculum with a focus on academic excellence and student engagement. Our lycée offers the standard three-year upper secondary program with specialty streams.
overview.paragraph2: Although relatively new, our school has quickly earned a distinguished reputation among the province's secondary schools for both academic results and educational influence. We emphasize community engagement and celebrate student achievement.

pc.title: PC Stream (Physics-Chemistry)
pc.description: Our PC stream focuses on advanced physics and chemistry concepts with rigorous mathematical applications. Students develop strong analytical and experimental skills in our laboratories, preparing them for university studies in engineering and physical sciences.

svt.title: SVT Stream (Life & Earth Sciences)
svt.description: The SVT stream emphasizes biology, geology, and ecological sciences. Students engage in laboratory work and field studies, preparing for university programs in medicine, biology, environmental science, and related fields.

math.title: Mathematics Stream
math.description: The mathematics stream at Argane Secondary School emphasizes advanced mathematical concepts with applications in physics and chemistry. This rigorous program prepares students for competitive university programs.

literary.title: Literary Stream
literary.description: Our literary program focuses on Arabic and French literature, philosophy, and humanities. Students develop critical thinking and communication skills while exploring cultural and historical texts.

arts.title: Arts & Culture
arts.description: Our school promotes artistic expression through various cultural activities including Amazigh dance, theater, music, and visual arts. Students showcase their talents in regular performances and exhibitions.

environmental.title: Environmental Education
environmental.description: We emphasize environmental awareness through special projects and activities. Our students participate in environmental journalism competitions and community initiatives related to sustainability.

common.title: Common Core (Tronc Commun)
common.description: The first year of upper secondary follows a common curriculum for all students, providing foundational knowledge across core subjects.
common.point1: Core subjects including Arabic, foreign languages, and Islamic education
common.point3: Standardized regional exams at year's end

first.title: First Baccalaureate (Première)
first.description: Students select specialized streams based on interests and aptitudes, beginning focused study in their chosen field.

second.title: Second Baccalaureate (Terminale)
second.description: The final year of lycée culminates in the national Baccalauréat examination, which determines university eligibility.

achievements.title: Academic Achievements
achievements.description: Our students have participated in various competitions and projects, demonstrating their academic abilities and commitment to excellence. We regularly celebrate student achievements through special ceremonies and events.
achievements.item1: Mohammed VI Foundation's 'Young Journalists for the Environment' Competition Entry (2023)
achievements.item2: Environmental Photography Prize - 'Where to? Who Stops the Sprawl?' (2023)
achievements.item3: Celebration of Excellence Ceremony for Top Academic Achievers (2017)
achievements.item5: Distinguished Academic Results in Provincial Rankings

cultural.title: Cultural Events
cultural.description: We regularly host artistic and cultural events featuring Amazigh (Ahwash) dances, songs, plays in both Amazigh and French, and other performances to celebrate our heritage.

environmental.title: Environmental Initiatives
environmental.description: Our students participate in environmental journalism competitions and projects, including work on plastic pollution and sustainability in our local community.

recognition.title: Academic Recognition
recognition.description: We celebrate student achievement through special ceremonies that honor top performers from all grade levels and recognize excellence in academics and extracurricular activities.

cta.title: Ready to Join Arganee Secondary School?
cta.description: Begin your journey toward the Baccalauréat at one of Tiznit's distinguished secondary schools.

about.title: About Arkan Secondary School
about.subtitle: A distinguished lycée qualifiant in Tiznit committed to academic excellence and community engagement.

overview.description1: Arkan Secondary School (الثانوية التأهيلية أركان) is an upper-secondary lycée qualifiant located in the city of Tiznit in the Souss-Massa region of Morocco. Established in the 2014s, our school has quickly earned a distinguished place among the province's secondary schools in terms of academic results and educational influence.
overview.description2: Our school offers the standard Moroccan educational pathway with classes for the common core (جذوع مشتركة), Premier Baccalauréat (1ère bac), and Terminal Baccalauréat (2ème bac). We are committed to academic excellence, cultural engagement, and community development.

establishment.title: 2014s: Establishment
establishment.description: Arkan Secondary School was established in the 2014s as a new lycée qualifiant in the city of Tiznit, with a mission to provide quality upper-secondary education to the local community.

cultural.title: 2015: Cultural Development
cultural.description: The school organized its "Artistic-Educational Evening" under the motto "Success for All", featuring recitations, Amazigh (Ahwash) dances, songs, and plays in both Amazigh and French.

excellence.title: 2017: Recognition of Excellence
excellence.description: Arkan Secondary School hosted a "Celebration of Excellence" ceremony to honor top-achieving students from all academic levels, and earned distinction among the province's secondary schools for academic results.

environmental.title: 2023: Environmental Engagement
environmental.description: Students participated in the Mohammed VI Foundation's "Young Journalists for the Environment" competition, submitting a video report about plastic waste in Tiznit and winning a prize for an environmental photograph.

programs.title: Educational Programs
programs.description: Following the standard Moroccan educational system, our lycée offers a three-year upper secondary program:

commonCore.title: Tronc Commun (Common Core)
commonCore.description: The first year provides a common curriculum for all students. At the end of this year, students take standardized regional exams and are then tracked into specific streams based on their choices and results.

firstBac.title: First Baccalaureate Year (1ère Bac)
firstBac.description: In this second year, students begin specializing in their chosen streams, which may include:

secondBac.title: Second Baccalaureate Year (2ème Bac)
secondBac.description: The final year continues students' specialization in their chosen streams. All students take the national Baccalauréat exam at the end of this year, which is required for university admission.

academic.title: Academic Excellence
academic.description: As reported in 2017, our lycée has quickly "earned a distinguished place among the province's secondary schools in terms of academic results and educational influence."

cultural.title: Cultural Events
cultural.description: Our school regularly hosts cultural and educational events that showcase student talents and recognize achievements:

evening.title: Artistic-Educational Evening (2015):
evening.description: Featured recitations, Amazigh dances, songs, and theatrical performances

excellence.title: Celebration of Excellence (2017):
excellence.description: Recognized top students and included a moral theater performance about exam ethics

unesco.title: UNESCO's World Argane Tree Day:
unesco.description: Organized a cultural week with exhibitions, mural painting, and scientific talks

environmental.title: Environmental Engagement
environmental.description: Our students actively participate in environmental awareness and conservation efforts:

projects.video: Video report on plastic waste in Tiznit submitted to the Mohammed VI Foundation's "Young Journalists for the Environment" competition (2023)
projects.photo: Award-winning environmental photograph titled "Where to? Who Stops the Sprawl?" highlighting pollution threatening local date-palm groves (2023)

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Our school benefits from strong community and parent involvement:

initiatives.notebooks: In the 2016/2017 school year, parents through the parent-teacher association donated 1,000 large notebooks to distribute to all Arkan students
initiatives.media: This initiative was covered by local media as an example of community mobilization for quality education

facilities.title: Facilities
facilities.description: While detailed information on Arkan's facilities is not extensively documented, our school is equipped with essential educational spaces to support student learning and activities:

auditorium.title: Auditorium/School Hall
auditorium.description: Our school has a dedicated space (قاعة أو فضاء المؤسسة) for hosting cultural events, ceremonies, and student performances.

classrooms.title: Classrooms
classrooms.description: Modern classrooms equipped for the different educational levels and streams: common core, first baccalaureate, and second baccalaureate.

campus.title: Campus Grounds
campus.description: Outdoor areas that accommodate exhibitions, cultural activities, and student gatherings.

resources.title: Educational Resources
resources.description: Learning materials and resources to support the national curriculum across all streams and specializations.

cta.title: Join Our Academic Community
cta.description: Arkan Secondary School offers a supportive environment where students can excel academically and develop personally through diverse educational and cultural experiences.

banner.welcome: Welcome to Argane High School in Tiznit — where knowledge, values, and ambition come together to shape a brighter future.

welcome.title: A Tradition of Excellence
welcome.description: Since {{year}}, {{name}} has been committed to providing quality education that prepares students for success in their academic and professional journeys. Our dedicated faculty and comprehensive curriculum ensure that every student receives the attention and resources they need to excel.
welcome.environment: We foster a supportive learning environment where creativity, critical thinking, and character development are prioritized alongside academic achievement.
